thread.title: Bill E Z
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Bill E Z

author: Bill E Z
title: Bill E Z
text:
I am a extremely picky shopper. It took me several days of research to decide exactly what I intended to buy.
I'm always looking for the best price with the best quality, I review all aspects of the items I intend to buy: manufacturer, technical details and I read many many reviews from the top 5 stars to the lowest ones.
All of this information was easily available in the B&H website. I correlate the information with other sellers and various other websites (including blogs).
B&H has always described the items from their online catalog with accuracy and they do not edit the reviews (good or bad).
The process of searching the catalog, item selection and ordering was easy and quick. There were no pop-ups to distract me. The shipping info is very good.
I will shop here again.
